Name: ProjectM : Daydream
About the game: About this game After summer vacation is over, Dong-Woo gets invited to Seung-Ah’s house. While Seung-Ah chatters away about her memorable vacation, Dong-Woo drifts away into a brief daydream about going skydiving in Interlaken, Switzerland and spending time with Seung-Ah at the beach in Nerja, Spain. Waking up from his daydream, Dong-Woo is back in Seung-Ah’s kitchen where they continue their conversation about summer vacation. Experience skydiving and be transported to a sunset beach through Dong-Woo’s eyes in this VR experience.   Interaction Minimal interaction is made by looking at icons, text dialogues and Seung-Ah herself.   Language and voice User interface and subtitles are available in Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese (traditional & simplified), German, Spanish and French. Voice is only available in Korean.
